author: Roland
content:
Diagonals? Not a single diagonal in this shot, Andreas. Yeah, right, this is nit picking... ðŸ™‚ What I like is the way the bicycle is standing on its own platform. I get the feeling of seeing a bicycle that fled from the dust or maybe arriving flood and is now anxiously looking down... 

Your view is a pure provocation to my brain... and I love you for that.

cheers
Roland
